model.name: Web4 Component Service Integration Simplification
model.description: ServiceCapable interface violates 'one interface per file' principle and is over-engineered. When ONCE kernel loads component dynamically into 42777 server, component is already service-capable via instantiation. No additional endpoints/ports required.
model.rationale: Current ServiceCapable.interface.ts contains multiple interfaces (ServiceRegistration + ServiceCapable) violating Web4 principle. Over-engineered with unnecessary endpoint management when ONCE 42777 server provides service capability through dynamic loading.
acceptance_criteria: ServiceRegistration moved to separate file if needed
Simplified service capability via ONCE kernel loading only
Component service availability via 42777 server instantiation
model.implementation_notes: When ONCE kernel loads component into 42777 server, component becomes service-capable automatically. Additional service registration complexity unnecessary.
